FuncDef: This command configures the forwarding plane octet and packet counters of a policer or queue to count packets of a specific type or state. For example separate counters for IPv4/IPv6.

ParaDef.Info: Count IPv4 and IPv6 forwarded/dropped octets and packets separately.

ExtraInfo: Default: no stat-modeFor policers, the default is no stat-mode override. The sap-ingress stat-mode is used instead.For queues, the default is to count in and out-of-profile octets and packets.
